resources.string: 1- Covid-19 or the novel coronavirus first emerged in Wuhan, China in December, 2019.
"2- Its primary symptoms are cough, fever, shortness of breath. The virus spreads through lungs, it can cause Pneumonia and in severe cases death. "
"3- The coronavirus spreads from bodily fluids (saliva or mucus) just like other respiratory diseases such as cold and flu. \" "
4- It initially transmitted from animals to humans and now it can transmit from humans to humans.
"5- It can survive for a varied number of hours on different surfaces and can infect people who come in contact with those surfaces. "
6- It takes upto 14 days before the symptoms appear.
7- There is no vaccine for new coronavirus.
"8- Maintaining basic hygiene, and frequently washing your hands for 20 seconds can reduce the chances of infection. "
If there is a problem, or you need assistance for using the app, please refer to the FAQs sections. If you can’t find answer to your query there please e-mail at
Is the data displayed in the app authentic?
"The data displayed in the app is collected from authorized sources such as World Health Organization and official statistics about the Covid-19 cases. published by each country. "
Infected cases indicate the number of total patients that got the infection, it also includes the number of people who recovered or died from the infection.
How can I sort the list of countries?

This list of countries can be sorted by tapping at the right most side of the Search country bar. You can sort the list alphabetically using two options; ascending (AZ) and descending (ZA). The list can be sorted by number of deaths, infected cases and recovered cases, where countries with highest number of respective cases shown at the top.

Fantech Labs is an information technology & consulting company that provides highly innovative and flexible solutions to address digital needs of businesses. We are a team of individuals that value learning, creativity, and agility at work. Technology is our passion; we use it as a means to help business and communities grow. With the aim of serving communities and helping them in these testing times, Fantech has decided to play its part. NoVoid is our way of showing care, love and support to people around the world affected from Covid-19. NoVoid is a Covid-19 tracking app, that keeps users up to date about the cases, recoveries and unfortunate deaths of patients around the world. The app is absolutely free and displays data for all the countries that are affected. It also provides guidelines and safety measures approved by WHO to help people take the right steps for dealing with Covid-19.
